Texts.Chs: 带羽毛的胡萝卜。既能吃又能挠痒痒。
Texts.Eng: A carrot with a feather. Good for eating as well as tickling.

Texts.Chs: 翼族美食。只有最好的菜肴才有羽冠花。
Texts.Eng: An Avian delicacy. Only the finest of dishes contain feathercrown.

Texts.Chs: 羽冠花，你必须在食用前摘下它。
Texts.Eng: Feathercrown, you have to pluck it before consuming.

Texts.Chs: 羽毛在水下不会茂盛。羽冠花也是如此。
Texts.Eng: Feathers do not flourish underwater. Neither do feathercrowns.

Texts.Chs: 看起来像胡萝卜和翼族杂交。至少可以说是不寻常的。
Texts.Eng: Looks like a carrot crossed with an Avian. Unusual to say the least.

Texts.Chs: 看起来像个鸟人，尝起来像土。鸟人品尝师。
Texts.Eng: Looksss like a birdman, tassstes like dirt. Birdmen tassstier.

Texts.Chs: 也许有一天，一顶羽毛冠冕会发展出感知力，升空。
Texts.Eng: Perhaps one day a feathercrown will develop sentience and take to the skies.

Texts.Chs: 一种带着羽毛般惊喜的水果。
Texts.Eng: The fruit with a feathery surprise.
